name: Battleground Alpha
description:
Description

Old school top-down tank battlefield game with some pumping music and a highscore list.

Features
  • top10 highscore board (locally only)
  • 8 rounds with increasing difficulty (enemy count + enemy level) + an extra boss round
  • 6 different enemy types + reconnaissance drone + boss enemy
  • 5 different weapon types (shell, rocket barrage, mortar, laser + flamethrower) + radar scanner
  • different terrain frictions (shallow water, sand, grass, road)
  • enemy behavior strategy depending on enemy type
  • dynamic fog shading over complete battlefield
  • health and quadruple-damage pickups with announcer voice
  • pickups directional radar (blue)
  • enemies directional radar (red), to speed up findings enemies which are still alive when no enemy is near
Tips
  • you can pause the game with 'P'
  • constant movement and using the environment is a key for success
  • moving on roads is a big advantage when you're in trouble
  • different enemies have different sight radius and different rate of fire
  • enemy shells can be shot down, but laser, mortars, rockets and flamethrower not (of course)
  • destroyed enemy hulls remain, but are destroyable as well if needed
  • use the directional radar to be prepared for enemies, to locate distant enemies and to find pickups
  • drones alert all enemies in a big area of your presence, so shooting them down should be a priority
  • the boss starts new drones when the old ones are shot down
  • flamethrowers even penetrate forests, so you're not safe behind if you're still near
  • there are still some development cheats in the game - see if you can find them ;)
Known issues
  • none atm :)
